Since there's no stretch, it was difficult to get both arms in the cardigan without pulling.  It did turn out cute, however if I'd had more time, I would have returned it and ordered a larger size.

This shirt is so pretty, but not comfortable at all due to how big and stretched out feeling the tube top is! It may work if you order a size smaller, but I got my regular size and the shrug fits perfect but the top absolutely will not stay up. If you order your regular size, I'd recommend some fabric tape to keep it up!
I love this! I’m usually a M but got a small. It fit perfectly and has a stretch to it! Super cute 🥹

Bought this for a downtown/bar shirt and of course it came broken. The lace on the sleeves was torn. The sleeves were the right size but the top was much too big even for a girl with a larger chest so if you decide you want it size down. It’s being ripped already ruined it for me. I don’t recommend this item for its price since yours will likely come pre-ripped  or too large.

I never write reviews about anything but I had to for this. I’m a little on the bigger side so I was worried about how it would look on me but I love it so much. I’m a 38C and the shirt holds everything up great! It’ll definitely be my new go-to going out top. (5’11, 185lbs got a large)
This top is everything and more color is bomb and stretchy. I also love that it is comfortable.
This too is cute and sexy for a night out! It’s comfortable and I love that I can wear it with or without the sleeves.
